name: Shape Rivals
description:
Tell us if you like the game or not and if you have any idea how we can improve it. All feedback is valuable to us and we'd love to know your thoughts.

Welcome to Shape Rivals , a world where every player goes through a different adventure. You need to eliminate your rivals to reach the end.

Shape Rivals it's an arcade top down shooter with fast-paced combat that involves geometric shapes.

Controls
  • Movement: WASD | Arrow Keys
  • Melee: Left Click
  • Range attack: Right Click
Future Development
  • Support for Controller
  • Endless mode
  • Music
  • New features and mechanics
